title: Which mid laner should I buy?
body: Hi so I'm just an unranked lol player looking for a fun midlaner to play. I would prefer champs that are mobile and have good potential when mastered. I currently own Fizz Leblanc and Kat for mid lane. Thanks for al the suggestions.

replies.body:
Highly mobile midlaners, hmm...

Ahri's pretty similar to what you're playing now. Azir and Lissandra are mobile but play quite differently from those three.

Zed, Talon, and Yasuo as other players mentioned here are also similar in playstyle, just AD-focused, and similarly rather quick.
Please don't convince people to play Yasuo.

{{champion:91}} Hes the most underrated champ. If you get good with him you'll hear things like "Talon is broken". Just cause his burst is ridiculous.

I wouldn't say broken, but he is easily the worst designed assassin in game at the moment. There's very little game play involved on either party's side.  He either all ins and kills you or all ins and doesn't. There's very little the person on the receiving end can do about it. Factor in very high damage harrass, and his only downside is mana costs, and those aren't really much of an issue for mid laners after the first blue.

I'm not saying there's no skill to playing him, but I can promise you with 100% certainty that he has a rework coming.

I wouldn't say his only downside is his mana costs. 
Cons
Early game
Mana Costs
No Escapes, without sacrificing some damage(easily countered by pink/oracle)
Needs items

It's like when people say Diana is OP because she 1-shots squishies with no MR, 
even though she's a completely all-in champ. There's so much counter-play past just dodging her Qs.
